branchCategory.name: C95M(D), ISO Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod w/Metallic Rod Scraper
branchCategory.description: <p>The C95 is ISO, VDMA24562 interchangeable, and utilizes a tie rod construction. In addition to standard cushions, wear band, the C95 utilizes a "floating" cushion seal design that greatly improves operation.</p>
